author: jleroux
msg: Followed Scott"s suggestion and added a generic EMAIL_PASSWORD EmailTemplateSetting (used to send a new password at user request)
I finally kept also the previous way because it allow an easier 18n of at the email subject.

Still the same concern: OOTB, if the user has not set a SMPT server in general.properties for the defaultFromEmailAddress the message "A new password has been created and sent to you. Please check your Email." when actually nothing happens. But that's anyway user's responsibility
